#Quick viewing EXIF

###View EXIF data just mouse over the image
###Supportes Template, Cache, Exclude (in Options page)	

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/exifviewer-chrome/readme.md)**
summary: EXIF Viewer is a Chrome extension that allows you to quickly view EXIF information in pictures.
